Coveo component FieldValue

This component can be used as part of a result template to display the value of a field associated with the current search result.
This component is usually located inside a FieldTable.
A common use of this component is to display a specific field value, when that field also happens to be a facet. When the field value is clicked on, the corresponding facet is activated.

Component Options

displaySeparator

displaySeparator: string
  • Defined in src/ui/FieldTable/FieldValue.ts :89

Specifies the string used to display multi-value fields in the UI. It is inserted between the displayed values. The default value is , .

facet

facet: string
  • Defined in src/ui/FieldTable/FieldValue.ts :66

Specifies the facet to be toggled when the component is clicked on.
When no value is specified, the value of the field option is used.
If the facet id is custom (e.g. not the same name as its field), you must specify manually this option in order to link the correct facet.

field

field: string
  • Defined in src/ui/FieldTable/FieldValue.ts :59

Specifies the field to be displayed by the FieldValue.
This field is required.

helper

helper: string
  • Defined in src/ui/FieldTable/FieldValue.ts :95

Specifies the helper to be used by the FieldValue to display its content.
A few helpers exist by default (see ICoreHelpers), and new ones can be custom-created (see TemplateHelpers).

helperOptions

helperOptions: any
  • Defined in src/ui/FieldTable/FieldValue.ts :99

Specifies the options to call on the specified helper.

htmlValue

htmlValue: boolean
  • Defined in src/ui/FieldTable/FieldValue.ts :71

Specifies if the content to display is an HTML element.
The default value is false

separator

separator: string
  • Defined in src/ui/FieldTable/FieldValue.ts :83

Specifies the string used to split multi-value fields from the index. The default value is ;.

splitValues

splitValues: boolean
  • Defined in src/ui/FieldTable/FieldValue.ts :78

Specifies if the field value is to be split at each FieldValue.options.separator. This is useful for splitting groups by a facet field.
The values displayed are split by the FieldValue.options.displaySeparator.
The default value is false.

Static get

  • get(element: HTMLElement, componentClass?: any, noThrow?: boolean): BaseComponent

  • Inherited from Component.get

    • Defined in src/ui/Base/Component.ts :176

    Get the bound component to the given HTMLElement. Throws an assert if the HTMLElement has no component bound, unless using the noThrow argument
    If there is multiple component bound to the current HTMLElement, you must specify the component class

    Parameters

    • element: HTMLElement

      HTMLElement for which to get the bound component

    • Optional componentClass: any

      Optional component class. If the HTMLElement has multiple components bound, you must specify which one you are targeting

    • Optional noThrow: boolean

      Boolean option to tell the method to not throw on error

    Returns BaseComponent

componentStateModel

componentStateModel: ComponentStateModel

Inherited from Component.componentStateModel

  • Defined in src/ui/Base/Component.ts :71

Contains the state of different component (enabled vs disabled). Allows to get/set values. Trigger component state event when modified. Each component can listen to those events.
